name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the experiment (if omitted, a random name will be generated)

description.title: Description
description.description: An optional description of the experiment

version_id.title: Version Id
version_id.description: ID of the dataset version over which the experiment will be run (if omitted, the latest version will be used)

repetitions.title: Repetitions
repetitions.description: Number of times the experiment should be repeated for each example

CreateExperimentRequestBody.title: CreateExperimentRequestBody
CreateExperimentRequestBody.description: Details of the experiment to be created

dataset_id.title: Dataset Id
dataset_id.description: The ID of the dataset associated with the experiment

dataset_version_id.title: Dataset Version Id
dataset_version_id.description: The ID of the dataset version associated with the experiment

repetitions.title: Repetitions
repetitions.description: Number of times the experiment is repeated

project_name.title: Project Name
project_name.description: The name of the project associated with the experiment

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: The creation timestamp of the experiment

updated_at.title: Updated At
updated_at.description: The last update timestamp of the experiment

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID of the inserted span annotation

span_id.title: Span Id
span_id.description: OpenTelemetry Span ID (hex format w/o 0x prefix)

annotator_kind.title: Annotator Kind
annotator_kind.description: The kind of annotator used for the annotation

label.title: Label
label.description: The label assigned by the annotation

score.title: Score
score.description: The score assigned by the annotation
